channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16448] Custom metrics for custom replication endpoints
item.description:
ReplicationEndpoints contain a MetricsSource class that can update a fixed set of key replication metrics. It does not, however, allow a developer implementing a custom ReplicationEndpoint to create/update custom metrics unique to the new endpoint's use case.

As it turns out, MetricsSource wraps a class, which in turn wraps a class, that implements the Hadoop BaseSource interface, which does allow for custom metrics. Simply having the two wrappers implement BaseSource as well with pass-through methods should be straightforward, and would allow replication endpoints to use these generic metric methods.
item.summary: Custom metrics for custom replication endpoints

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Made MetricsSource a decorator for the BaseSource implementation it already wrapped.

+1 overall

This message was automatically generated.

Please add an interface annotation similar to that of MetricsSource:


-public interface MetricsReplicationSourceSource {

+import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.BaseSource;

+

+public interface MetricsReplicationSourceSource extends BaseSource {

This change to the inheritance hierarchy of an LP interface is fine but means it can only go in on a new minor:


  * through the metrics interfaces.

  */

 @InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(HBaseInterfaceAudience.REPLICATION)

-public class MetricsSource {

+public class MetricsSource implements BaseSource {

Edit: Removed a review error

Andrew Purtell - Adding the interface annotation requires adding dependencies on hadoop-annotation and hbase-common libraries to hbase-hadoop-compat. Is this acceptable or does that mess up the design of the dependency tree? I know this has to work on multiple hadoop version profiles.

Adding the interface annotation requires adding dependencies on hadoop-annotation and hbase-common libraries to hbase-hadoop-compat

Ugh, ok nevermind

lgtm
Will commit later today
The master patch currently applies cleanly to branch-1, but attaching it separately for convenience.
